name: River Trek - Long Scarf
description:
This fine silk scarf reflects my obsession with the Australian landscape.

Camping out on a dry sandy river bed in the desert is the inspiration behind this design.  The sunrise, the stars and everything inbetween. Translated with love from one of my original paintings.
The gift of art for you or others.
Meagan J

www.meaganjacobs.com.au

100% Silk 24gsm
Size: 55 x 170cm
Designed in Australia and digitally printed in India
Care Instruction: Dry clean only

name: Kakadu Square Silk Scarf
description:
This fine silk scarf reflects my obsession with the Australian landscape. 
Inspired by the textures and shapes of the vast Australian Kakadu flood plains and meandering river systems featuring a rich earthy colour palette, this is favourite of mine.   Translated with love from one of my original paintings.
The gift of art for you or others.
Meagan J


www.meaganjacobs.com.au
 
100% Silk 24gsm 
Size:  90 x 90cm
Designed in Australia and digitally printed in India 
Care Instruction: Dry clean only
